articles.title: Kim Jong Il Receives President of Washington Times Corporation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Receives President of Washington Times Corporation 
    Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il Tuesday received Joo Dong Mun, president of the Washington Times Corporation, on a visit to Pyongyang.
 On the occasion the president offered his congratulations to  Kim Jong Il on the 60th anniversary of Korea's liberation.    
 Kim Jong Il welcomed the Pyongyang visit of the president, had a cordial talk with him and posed for a photograph with him.

articles.title: Kim Ki Nam Meets Kim Dae Jung
articles.content:
Kim Ki Nam Meets Kim Dae Jung 
    Seoul, August 16 (KCNA-Correspondent) -- Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland, who is participating in the August 15 Grand National Festival for Independence, Peace and Reunification in Seoul,  and his party Tuesday met Kim Dae Jung, former south Korean president, who is under medical treatment in hospital and inquired after his health.
 Kim Ki Nam conveyed greetings of leader Kim Jong Il to Kim Dae Jung.    
 Kim Dae Jung expressed deep thanks for this and inquired about the health of Kim Jong Il, before asking Kim Ki Nam to give him his best regards.

articles.title: Greetings to Gabonese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Gabonese President 
    Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to El Hadj Omar Bongo, president of Gabon, on August 11 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of independence of his country.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and develop in the mutual interests of the two peoples, the message sincerely wished the Gabonese president and people greater success in the work for peace and development of the country.

Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chairman of Turner Foundation INC. of U.S.
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chairman of Turner Foundation INC. of U.S.
    Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Robert Edward Turner, chairman of the Turner Foundation INC. of the United States, on a visit to the DPRK.
 The gift was handed to an official concerned by the chairman.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Delegation
    Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting delegation of war veteran lawmakers of Russia.
 The gift was conveyed to Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Aug. 15 by Vasilii Klyuchenok, first vice-chairman of the Defence and Security Committee of the Federation Council of Russia, who is heading the delegation.

Greetings to Indonesian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Indonesian President
    Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, president of Indonesia, on Aug. 16 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the independence of his country.
 The message said that the DPRK and Indonesia have long established and developed close friendly bonds on the principle of independence, equality and reciprocity.
